participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and outgoing, loves exploring the outdoors and trying new activities.
participant_1.background: i like to go hiking in the spring. i live in colorado. i have a black lab named trooper. i'm a mechanical engineer. my favorite activity is rock climbing.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and resilient, with a passion for performance and a healthy lifestyle.
participant_2.background: i was raised in a single parent household. i only eat kosher. i am a stunt double as my second job. i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life.

content.text: Hey! Are you a mechanical engineer? Because I am.
